Type: Vests
Price: 12.05

[shortdesc]

Open Road 5 Point Tear Away Safety Vest

  • 5-point hook-and-loop tear away design- fluorescent mesh fabric with 4 front pockets
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Open Road
    Line Open Road
    Product Type Vests
    Size One size

    Extra Product Information

  • Polyester mesh tape configuration meets WCB requirements 2 Inch Vi-brance® reflective safety material in 4 Inch contrasting tape meets WCB/Worksafe/DOT configuration Safety D-ring slot access 5-point hook-and-loop tear away design and 4 front pockets Dual

    • Suggested Application

Open Road InchBTE Inch Safety Vest

    Size Large/ X-Large
